Useful things to know:

Blue numbers are keybinds to the buttons (its a keybind to the number)

White numbers are how many of each dice you have

if you have no dice you can use the coin

to use the coin right click on an enemy

(h)With homing attacks, you can click the enemy

(c)With on click attacks, click where you want it to go

(m)With melee, when you click the button it will activate

(d)With directional, when you click the button it fires the way you are facing

gameplay vid : 

The following are the different spells currently in-game:

Examples: 1d4 = 1-4; 2d6 = 1-12(evens)

Coin:

Laser (homing)

  • Laser does 1-4 damage
D4:

Dagger 1d4 (melee)

  • Melee stab

Magic Missile 3d4 (homing)

  • 3 missiles each does 1d4 damage

Cloud of daggers 12d4 (on click)

  • Hits enemies three times for 4d4 damage #Hits enemies for 1d4 damage, stays there for 20 secs
  • Stays in place
D6:

Mind Sliver 1d6 (homing)

  • A spike that does 1d6 damage
  • Next attack an enemy does has -1d4 damage #already too op, so no

Burning Hands 3d6 (directional)

  • Cone of fire coming from player that does 3d6 damage #how does it come out of hand if it on click

Scorching ray 6d6 (homing)

  • 3 lasers that each  do 2d6 damage
  • When target dies enemy closest to last target is now targeted # nope
D8:

Booming Blade 1d8 (melee)

  • Melee attack for 1d8 damage

Thunderwave 2d8 (melee)

  • Does 2d8 damage

Blight 8d8 (homing)

  • Does 8d8 damage
D10:

Firebolt 1d10 (homing)

  • Small ball of fire does 1d10 damage

Sickening Radiance 4d10 (on click)

  • Orbital laser strike which slows enemies
  • Does 4d10 damage

Steel Wind Strike 6d10 (directional)

  • Large sword slash that does 6d10 damage
  • Player is teleported right in front of the slash
D12:

Poison spray 1d12 (directional)

  • Fart cloud near player which does 1d12 damage

Erupting earth 3d12 (on click)

  • Area where this hits now slows enemies 
  • Deals 3d12 damage

Negative energy flood 5d12  (homing)

  • Deals 5d12 damage
